rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment does not contain high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlative negative nouns, or critical alert phrases.
No moderate verb paired with significant scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment quotes a source stating confidence in future elimination ('we will be able to eliminate this'), not explicit calming about present safety or control. Falls under Q6.

States a belief/prediction about future outcome ('we will be able to eliminate this') based on conditions ('with good biosecurity, with good farmer participation'), which is a hopeful future possibility/preparedness statement, without active reassurance.
